definition: to receive/to accept/to collect/to put away/to restrain/to stop/in care of (used on address line after name)
to hold back/to restrain/to control (oneself)/to collect/Taiwan pr. [lian4]
nature/character/property/quality/attribute/sexuality/sex/gender/suffix forming adjective from verb/suffix forming noun from adjective, corresponding to -ness or -ity/essence/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: Helpful in the treatment of diarrhea due to its astringent properties.
sentences.chinese: 有用在腹泻的治疗由于它的收敛性物产。

sentences.english: Our method Possesses global convergence under nondegenerate assumption.
sentences.chinese: 在非退化假设下，本文算法具有全局收敛性。

sentences.english: Aim To research the algorithm for solving nondifferentiable programming.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究求解不可微优化问题的算法及收敛性。

sentences.english: The actual proof of convergence is generally not trivial.
sentences.chinese: 并在通常条件下证明了方法的全局收敛性。

sentences.english: At the same time, the convergence is proven for solving 4-order plate bending problem.
sentences.chinese: 证明了该单元对薄板弯曲问题的收敛性。

sentences.english: The method has good preciseness and less unknown variables and it is convenient to be used in practice.
sentences.chinese: 该方法收敛性较好，未知量少，便于实际应用。

sentences.english: Results Convergence of the method under certain conditions is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 结果在一定的条件下，收敛性得到了保证。

sentences.english: The relationship between the order M of the exponential series function and astringency was also analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 分析了幂数级函数阶数M与其收敛性的关系。

sentences.english: We also prove that the method has superlinear convergence rate under some mild conditions.
sentences.chinese: 另外在较弱的条件下，证明该方法具有超线性收敛性。

sentences.english: However, at each iteration of the method, several trust region subproblems have to be solved.
sentences.chinese: 而且算法的全局收敛性不要求迭代矩阵序列的有界性。

sentences.english: The convergence with discrete parameter of set-valued supermartingale had been investigated by many scholars.
sentences.chinese: 离散参数集值上鞅的收敛性已有诸多学者研究过。

sentences.english: Moreover, we discuss the convergence for randomly weighted sums of B-valued martingale difference series.
sentences.chinese: 还进一步讨论了B值鞅差序列随机加权和的收敛性。

sentences.english: In chapter 4 we use some numerical experiments to demonstrate the convergence of our schemes.
sentences.chinese: 第四章用一些数值试验说明所提格式的收敛性。

sentences.english: Making you feel its sweety after taste and with strong shrink ality.
sentences.chinese: 回味甘甜且带有较强收敛性。

sentences.english: The convergence theorem of the proposed method is proved based on the exact solution of the subproblem.
sentences.chinese: 基于子问题的精确求解，该文证明了算法的收敛性。

sentences.english: The convergence properties of Newton′s method for a type of overdetermined systems of equations were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了一类超定非线性方程组的牛顿迭代法的收敛性。
